summary: The diff implements the requested PWA install UX updates in `PWAInstallCallout.tsx`: a prominent primary "Install" CTA when programmatic install is available, removal of any "Dismiss" wording, manual-install instructions when not installable (including a browser/device availability disclaimer), and a secondary hide control ("Not now" and an X) persisted via localStorage. It also hides the callout after successful installation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an unused `clearCalloutHidden()` storage helper (extra API beyond the requested hide/persist behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-52 only requires persisting the hidden choice; no requirement mentions a separate clear/reset API.

hallucinated_features.description: Added console logging around PWA install events and outcomes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Logging was not requested by any requirement or acceptance criteria.
